name: Gesundheit!
summary: Gesundheit! is an independently made PC game in which you help an allergic pig save a city from evil snot-eating monsters. With hand drawn graphics and an original recorded soundtrack, Gesundheit! is a retro-action-puzzle game, and was selected for the Independent Games Festival at Game Developers Conference 2008. This is an (eternally!) ongoing project for me, but here’s a 12-level demo.
info:
• 中文名: 鼻涕猪
  • 平台: PC,iOS, Android
  • 游戏引擎: AGS
  • 游戏设计师: Matt Hammill
  • 官方网站: http://www.matthammill.com/index.php/games/gesundheit/
